H0.text: The Royal Armouries has three locations, London, Leeds and which other city. Birmingham

H1.text: The Royal Armouries has three locations, London, Leeds and which other city. Manchester

H2.text: The Royal Armouries has three locations, London, Leeds and which other city. Bristol

H3.text: The Royal Armouries has three locations, London, Leeds and which other city. Portsmouth

A4.text: Fort Nelson, at its summit, is home to the Royal Armouries museum.
